channel.title: GdnBloggers on Forest Garden Wales
channel.description: Recent content in GdnBloggers on Forest Garden Wales

item.title: A forest garden is a way to garden
item.author: helo@forestgarden.wales (Jake Rayson)
item.description: I listened to the Margaret Roach podcast A Way to Garden, the episode entitled “Go ahead, we dare you: widen your plant palette”, with Andy Brand.

item.title: I’ve had enough, it’s time to quit!
item.author: helo@forestgarden.wales (Jake Rayson)
item.description: For the past 3 years I’ve been leading a double life. By day, a jolly Forest Gardener.
